item.title: 特朗普团队在委内瑞拉问题上的 "权力游戏 "鞭笞雪佛龙公司
item.description: 本周，特朗普政府仅用了 24 小时就在委内瑞拉问题上做出了最新的反转，白宫闭门造车的分歧一触即发，雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp.【原文：It took barely 24 hours this week for the Trump administration to execute its latest reversal on Venezuela, with the fate of a huge Chevron Corp. venture hanging in the balance as closed-door White House differences broke into the open.】

item.title: 艾尔登指环》真人电影正在制作中，由亚历克斯-加兰执导
item.description: A24 电影公司和万代南梦宫娱乐公司将与《机械姬》（Ex Machina）导演亚历克斯-加兰（Alex Garland）合作，根据奇幻角色扮演游戏《艾尔登魔戒》（Elden Ring）改编拍摄真人电影。【原文：A24 Films and Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc. will work with Ex Machina director Alex Garland on a live-action film based on the fantasy role-playing game Elden Ring.】

item.title: 日本赤泽将访美参加第三轮美国贸易谈判
item.description: 日本最高贸易谈判代表赤泽亮世将于周五启程前往美国，与特朗普政府进行第三轮贸易谈判。【原文：Japan’s top trade negotiator Ryosei Akazawa will leave Friday for the US for a third round of trade talks with the Trump administration.】

item.title: 欧佩克+考虑再次大幅增加供应，石油将出现周度下跌
item.description: 由于欧佩克+组织（OPEC+）考虑再次大举增产，这可能会增加市场供应，而市场本已预期将面临供应过剩的局面，石油将迎来三周以来的首次下跌。【原文：Oil headed for its first weekly decline in three, as OPEC+ weighed another bumper production increase that could add supplies into a market already expected to face a glut.】

item.title: 英国消费者信心因降息和美国贸易协议而上升
item.description: 一项新的调查显示，英国消费者信心在 5 月份略有回升，原因是英国央行放宽了借贷成本，而且政府官员与美国达成了贸易协议。【原文：UK consumer confidence rebounded slightly in May, a new survey showed, as the Bank of England eased borrowing costs and government officials struck a trade deal with the US.】

item.title: 一元店将推动马来西亚 IPO，成为本年度最大的上市企业
item.description: 折扣连锁店 Eco-Shop Marketing Bhd 周五在马来西亚上市，这将是马来西亚今年最大的首次公开募股，将造就一位亿万富翁。【原文：Discount-chain Eco-Shop Marketing Bhd. debuts in Malaysia on Friday in a listing that’s set to create a billionaire after the nation’s biggest initial public offering of the year.】

item.title: 阿根廷向投资者发出信号：尽管有储备金，国际货币基金组织仍将提供现金
item.description: 阿根廷官员上周在伦敦向投资者表示，无论他们在新计划实施几个月后是否未能达到重建外汇储备的目标，他们都希望下个月能从国际货币基金组织获得 20 亿美元的拨款。【原文：Argentine officials signaled to investors in London last week they expect to receive a $2 billion disbursement from the International Monetary Fund next month regardless of whether they miss a target for rebuilding foreign reserves just a few months into a new program.】

item.title: 美国政府债务和美元上涨，黄金维持跌势
item.description: 黄金在本周首次下跌后企稳，因为一些交易商转向长期美国政府债券和美元，而不是贵金属。【原文：Gold steadied after its first decline this week, as some traders turned to long-term US government bonds and the dollar instead of the precious metal.】

item.title: 中国顶级制药商恒瑞开始在香港交易
item.description: 江苏恒瑞医药股份有限公司是中国市值最大的制药企业，随着亚洲金融中心上市热潮的兴起，该公司在筹集了 99 亿港元（13 亿美元）资金后，将于周五在香港开始交易。【原文：Jiangsu Hengrui Pharmaceuticals Co., China’s largest drugmaker by market value, is set to begin trading in Hong Kong Friday after raising HK$9.9 billion ($1.3 billion) as listings pick up in the Asian financial hub.】

item.title: 美元和国债反弹，亚洲股市将上涨
item.description: 周五，亚洲股票期货走高，国债和美元反弹，表明本周早些时候震撼市场的美国财政担忧有所平息。美国股市变化不大。【原文：Asian equity futures edged higher Friday amid a rebound in Treasuries and the dollar in a sign of calming US fiscal fears that rocked markets earlier in the week. US stocks were little changed.】

item.title: 美元和国债反弹，亚洲股市将上涨：市场综述
item.description: 周五，亚洲股票期货走高，国债和美元反弹，表明本周早些时候震撼市场的美国财政担忧有所平息。美国股市变化不大。【原文：Asian equity futures edged higher Friday amid a rebound in Treasuries and the dollar in a sign of calming US fiscal fears that rocked markets earlier in the week. US stocks were little changed.】

item.title: 拉加德称国际贸易将今非昔比
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）警告说，尽管世界主要经济体正朝着某种妥协的方向迈进，但国际贸易将因关税紧张局势而永远改变。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde warned that international trade will be changed forever by the tensions over tariffs, even as the world’s leading economies edge toward some compromises.】

item.title: 高盛指控 1MDB 银行家在宣判前 "连续撒谎
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. said the banker at the heart of a scandal linked to Malaysia’s 1MDB investment fund engaged in “serial lies” and deception about the fraud, days before he is scheduled to be sentenced.】

item.title: 上田避免暗示将对债券收益率飙升采取任何行动
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）在超长期限证券收益率创下历史新高后，没有表示准备在债券市场采取行动，而是继续努力改善交易条件。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda refrained from indicating he’s prepared to take action in the bond market after yields on super-long dated securities hit a record high, amid a continuing effort to improve trading conditions.】

item.title: 巴西对汇款征税以支撑预算，雷亚尔抛售
item.description: 巴西将冻结 310 亿雷亚尔（约合 55 亿美元）的支出，并提高金融交易税，以安抚对路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦总统的财政承诺日益怀疑的投资者。【原文：Brazil will freeze 31 billion reais ($5.5 billion) in spending and raise a tax on financial transactions in a bid to assuage investors increasingly skeptical of President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s fiscal promises.】

item.title: 美国将停止制造新硬币，理由是节约和需求量低
item.description: 美国政府以需求急剧下降和节省开支为由，停止生产便士。【原文：The US government is ending production of the penny, citing drastically decreased demand and immediate savings.】

item.title: 尽管有了新的人工智能工具，Workday 的发展前景依然乏善可陈
item.description: Workday Inc.预计本季度的订阅收入与华尔街的预期一致，这让希望这家软件公司能从其产品的新人工智能功能中获得提振的投资者感到失望。【原文：Workday Inc. projected subscription revenue in the current quarter in line with Wall Street estimates, disappointing investors looking for the software company to get a boost from new artificial intelligence features for its products.】

item.title: Intuit 在推出更多税务服务后实现强劲增长
item.description: 在美国报税季结束后，Intuit 公司公布了强劲的收入增长，这表明这家财务软件公司正在成功地为用户提供更昂贵的服务。【原文：Intuit Inc. posted strong revenue growth following the end of the US tax season, suggesting the financial software company is finding success offering users more expensive services.】

item.title: Anthropic 首席执行官让员工做好准备，迎接人工智能改变他们的工作方式
item.description: 由于人工智能的出现，一家领先的人工智能研究实验室正在重新思考其员工的工作方式。但首先...【原文：One of the leading artificial intelligence research labs is rethinking the way its employees work because of AI. But first...】

item.title: 特朗普的房利美和房地美计划：谁输谁赢
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布他正在考虑对美国抵押贷款巨头房利美和房地美进行公开募股，这使得它们的股价飙升，对冲基金和其他投资者今年的收益扩大到近 500 亿美元。【原文：President Donald Trump’s announcement that he’s weighing a public offering of US mortgage giants Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac sent their shares soaring, extending gains this year for hedge funds and other investors to almost $50 billion.】

item.title: 巴克莱称日本可能要求国有企业购买债券
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）全球研究主席表示，如果较长期限债务的抛售势头不减，日本可能会考虑要求政府所有的实体支持该国的债券市场。【原文：Japan may consider asking government-owned entities to support the nation’s bond market if the selloff in longer-dated debt doesn’t abate, according to Barclays Plc’s global chair of research.】

item.title: 神秘期权买家押注美股上涨约 30 亿美元
item.description: 一位机构投资者以数十亿美元押注看涨美股，成为期权市场的热门话题。【原文：An institutional investor’s multi-billion dollar bullish bet on US stocks has become the talk of the options market.】

item.title: 苹果计划在 2026 年推出人工智能眼镜，取消带摄像头的手表
item.description: 苹果公司的目标是在明年年底推出智能眼镜，作为向人工智能增强型小工具推进的一部分，但该公司已经搁置了通过内置摄像头分析周围环境的智能手表计划。【原文：Apple Inc. is aiming to release smart glasses at the end of next year as part of a push into AI-enhanced gadgets, but it has shelved plans for a smartwatch that can analyze its surroundings with a built-in camera.】

item.title: 纽约联储主席佩里看到货币市场压力的早期迹象
item.description: 美联储庞大的证券投资组合经理表示，央行缩减资产负债表规模的努力已开始对回购协议市场造成压力。【原文：The manager of the Federal Reserve’s massive portfolio of securities said the central bank’s effort to reduce the size of its balance sheet is beginning to place pressure on the market for repurchase agreements.】

item.title: 股价下跌 31% 后，潘兴广场买入亚马逊股份
item.description: 比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）的潘兴广场资本管理公司（Pershing Square Capital Management）在亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc.【原文：Bill Ackman’s Pershing Square Capital Management built a new stake in Amazon.com Inc., calling it a “fantastic franchise” and noting that the investor acquired shares at an “extremely attractive” price.】

item.title: 钢铁工人老板敦促特朗普阻止收购美国钢铁公司
item.description: 美国钢铁工人联合会（United Steelworkers）主席戴维-麦考尔（David McCall）敦促唐纳德-特朗普总统阻止新日本钢铁公司（Nippon Steel Corp.【原文：United Steelworkers President David McCall urged President Donald Trump to block Nippon Steel Corp.’s bid to purchase United States Steel Corp., reiterating his opposition to the controversial proposed merger.】

item.title: 房利美和房地美股价飙升，特朗普再次提出私有化计划
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普提出将房利美（Fannie Mae）和房地美（Freddie Mac）在政府控制下近二十年后私有化的建议，使得这两家抵押贷款公司的股价跃升至 16 年来最高水平。【原文：A proposal by President Donald Trump to privatize Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac after almost two decades under government control has the mortgage companies’ stock prices leaping to their highest levels in 16 years.】
